name: Freerunner (Louis Braidwood)
description: Freerunner is a game developed in 12 hours as a personal challenge.  It's simple and easy to learn but surprisingly fun and intense!  The concept is simple, keep moving!  There are holes and obstacles along the way in each randomly generated map, but the goal is simple.  Get as high a score as you can!  I hope you enjoy! If you do feel free to follow me on twitter @ConsistentGames
